resources.string: Let\'s have some introduction first. Do you know how to mix colors? Have a try with basic colors. For example, mix red and yellow to get orange.
Mix red and blue to get purple.
"Your goal is to paint outer sides of crosses, so addition of these colors will result central color."
Tap outer squares to change their color.
You need to paint only two squares!
DO YOU REALLY WANT TO QUIT?
Try to solve this one colouring as few squares as possible. If you forget how to mix specific color, long press it and hint will appear ;)
Well played! I think you are ready to begin...
I am happy to introduce you brown
Say hello to pink, cyan and light yellow
Welcome to the bright side. Here is light orange
Oops... I forgot about light purple and light green
Are you ready for a new level? >:D
This one is easy. I swear :D
Sadly, it was the last level...
At least, you completed the level.
I think you need more training.
Even my cat can do it better.
One less square and you are there
I think you lost one star somewhere O_O
There is another better way to win
You are like a little shining star!
Oh my square! You did it!
I do not insist, but if you enjoy playing ColorQuad, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
